scenes.description: Shiori and Bijou discuss intrusive thoughts in a spooky library setting as the Nyakuzas point to the books.
Shiori picks her first book, 'Koseki Bijou', and Bijou explains the trial required to unlock its wisdom.
Trial 1: Shiori must act out memes, starting with her patented 'Shiori Beam'.
Trial 2: Shiori is tasked with 'rizzing up' the audience but ends up rizzing Bijou instead.
Trial 3: Shiori performs the 'biggest dab ever' to save her life and receives two magical apples.
Shiori heads to an altar and picks her second book, 'Play Time', as Bijou prepares the next trial.
